msg: (crop_children): Throw an exception on unexpected entry kind.

msg: Fix broken link to Windows Apache 2.2 binaries.

author: blair
msg: Follow up to r31758, update the copyright years.

author: blair
msg: Add two file-external fields to svn_wc_entry_t and update the methods
that operate directly on the structure.  Increment the wc format
Add two new fields, file_external_path, a string containing the
repository root relative path and file_external_rev, the
revision the file external is checked out from.
Set file_external_rev to svn_opt_revision_unspecified and set
file_external_path just so both are being set in the same place.
Copy the file external path and revision over if instructed to.

author: pburba
msg: Expand merge_tests.py 94 'merge fails with renamed subtrees with mergeinfo',
(merge_chokes_on_renamed_subtrees): Merge to a target that has a
*subtree* which has a rename in the requested merge range.
